selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final answer to match the expected output format.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to return the final answer in the format 'Answer: ...'.

new_skill_specs.name: read_angle_from_diagram
new_skill_specs.purpose: Extract the value of a specified angle from a given diagram image.
edge_cases: The angle label is not visible or obscured in the diagram.
Multiple angles are marked with the same label.

new_skill_specs.name: match_angle_to_option
new_skill_specs.purpose: Match a given angle value to the correct multiple-choice option.
edge_cases: The angle value does not match any of the options.
Multiple options have the same value.
